name: apptiser
subtitle: Demo Restaurant Website

description.sentence: You could have a website like this in less than an hour
description.paragraph: Responsively designed, ready-made websites that you can update yourself 24/7 in real-time, without any technical skills whatsoever.
description.full:
apptiser is a ready-made, customisable website that has been designed specifically to meet the requirements of the restaurant and hospitality industry, and to present your content in the best possible light, on any device.

apptiser has been developed by industry specialists to meet the growing expectations of your guests and to deliver the best performance standards in speed, search engine optimisation (SEO) and accessibility best practices.

More importantly for your business, apptiser allows you to easily keep your information fresh, accurate and up-to-date, via a simple content management system that you can access 24/7, from anywhere and from any device.

parking: Parking is free in the adjacent roads

reservations.info: If you would like to make a reservation then please use our booking request widget below and we will get back to you as soon as we can. Alternatively you can call us during our opening times.
reservations.groups: The maximum table size we can accommodate is 20 people.
reservations.private: If you would like to discuss hiring the restaurant for a private function then please telephone us during our opening times.

dishes.dish_desc: Seared King Scallops served in a Martini Creamy Sauce on our home-made Crostino
Grilled mixed Vegetables marinated in Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Vinegar
Home-made Chicken Liver Paté served with Rustic Sicilian Bread and Relish.
Sliced Beef Tomato, Mozzarella and Rocket with a drizzle of Virgin Olive Oil and Oregano / or with Avocado
Tiger Prawns pan-seared with Garlic, Fresh Parsley, Butter and Lemon Sauce
A traditional Ligurian recipe of Smoked Mackerel Paté with Focaccia and Horseradish
Fresh Clams, Garlic, little Chilli, Extra Virgin Olive Oil (with or without Tomato Sauce)
Homemade Pasta Parcels of Lobster and Ricotta, in its Bisque Sauce and Shrimps
Pasta with half dozen of King Prawns, Garlic, Chilli and little bit of Tomato Sauce
Homemade twist Pasta with Tomato Sauce, Luganica Sausage, Garlic, Chillies and Wild Rocket
Homemade Pasta Parcels filled with young Welsh Lamb, served in a Velvety Red Wine, fresh Rosemary and Garlic Sauce
Carmaroli Rice cooked in White Wine with Shallots and Porcini Mushrooms, drizzled with Truffle Oil, sprinkled with flakes of Parmigiano, topped with Wild Rocket
A Trio of Vanilla ice cream with Espresso Coffee and a shot of Strega or Disaronno liqueur
Savoiardi Ladyfingers soaked in Amaretto-Coffee with Mascarpone Cream
Sticky Toffee Pudding coated in warm Butterscotch sauce and served with Vanilla ice cream
